General.Name: Shandong Himile Mechanical Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Himile Mechanical Science and Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd manufactures, maintains, and sells tire molds in China and internationally. The company offers tire molds for passenger, light truck, TBR, OTR, giant earthmover, and motorcycle tires. It also provides design, casting, fabrication, machining, coating, assembly, and after-sales services for mechanical parts. In addition, the company offers wind power machinery, gear box, engineering machinery, injection molding machine, compressors, rail transportation, etc. for hub, injection molding machine, power cylinder, and gear box applications; and hydraulic curing press for giant OTR tires, and curing press for TBR tires, as well as mold cleaning machine. Further, it engages in the manufacture of general equipment, as well as investment and trade business. The company serves professional tire manufacturers. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Gaomi, China. Himile Mechanical Science and Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd was a former subsidiary of Himile Group Co.,Ltd.
